title: [Large-Scale] Computer-Based Patient Simulation for Enhancing Nursing Practice Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: For practicing nurses, implementing effective learning in resource-constrained technical environments using accessible smartphone-based simulation tools.

learning_goals: Accurately assess patient conditions and prioritize nursing interventions at 80% accuracy through simulation scenarios.
Reduce medication administration errors by 90% by applying clinical judgment protocols in computer-based simulations.
Practice emergency response communication skills at least three times through team-based simulation activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
